intro: Crocodeilanthe avirostris, commonly known as the horned fern, is a unique tropical plant belonging to the family Polypodiaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive, club-shaped fronds that resemble a horn, giving it its common name. The plant has a short, thick rhizome that supports its upright growth habit. Its leaves are typically dark green and can grow up to several feet in length. Crocodeilanthe avirostris thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests.
